Text:
M m m m m m Max Headroom. Holy shit !

Wonderful. I still got some episodes on . . . . wait for it . . . Betamax tape but no way to watch them. Great post thanks a lot

Relax!

My goal is to seed as much as possible during the day and all night from 9pm to 6pm EDT/EST (as needed). I hate inactive torrents as much as the next person, but I hate outrageous electric bills even more!
Will seed at least 100%. Saw this on tv years ago - loved it!
Fantastic! Will seed eternally in gratitude!

Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU!!! Long live MAX!
Will reseed to 2+
Thank you.  I was there.  So happy to find all of Max for posterity.
